result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brian L. Coshenet

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
1:31 PM Prosecuting attorney Lawrence James Lasee in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Brian L. Coshenet in court.  Attorney Brent Harold Debord in court for Brian L. Coshenet. Defendant understands charges. Atty Debord request PH, waiving time limits. Defendant ordered to appear at next hrg. Present bond cont'd.
Preliminary Hearing - Schedule or Waiver scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Arraignment scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Preliminary Hearing - Schedule or Waiver on November 18, 2022 at 10:00 am.

1:25 PM Prosecuting attorney John Luetscher in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Brian L. Coshenet in court.  Attorney Brent Harold Debord not in court. Court makes stmt. Atty Debord not present. Defendant ordered to appear at next hrg. Present bond cont'd.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 13, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt:
1:34 PM Prosecuting attorney Lawrence James Lasee in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Brian L. Coshenet in court. Court makes stmt. PFAC submitted to the Court. Court will appoint attorney. Defendant ordered to appear at next hearing. Present bond cont'd.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 11, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

1:08 PM Prosecuting attorney Lawrence James Lasee in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Brian L. Coshenet in court. Defendant would like counsel and needs more time to obtain counsel. Defendant ordered to appear at next hrg. Present bond cont'd.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant shall not have direct or indirect contact w/ M.C., phone contact allowed. Defendant shall maintain absolute sobriety. Defendant shall not possess/consume any illegal drugs, drug paraphernalia/controlled substances without a valid prescription. Defendant shall not possess/consume alcoholic beverages. Defendant shall immediately report to the Sheriff's Department for fingerprinting and photographing.

1:18 PM Defendant Brian L. Coshenet appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Edward Daniel Burke Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Spansail for SPD appeared by video. Def given complaint, advised of charges, and advised of right to counsel/SPD.  Conflict with DA Burke, fill in DA will handle case. Bond is set.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
